TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceProviderContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

summary.span: Définit un mécanisme de récupération d'un contrat de service à partir d'un composant.

span.span: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service contract from a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le interface définit un contrat qui permet à un composant d’obtenir un service personnalisé défini par un autre composant.The interface defines a contract that enables a component to obtain a custom service that is defined by another component. Un composant qui implémente est connu comme un fournisseur de services.A component that implements is known as a service provider. Fournisseurs de services implémentent la méthode pour retourner un qui implémente un service.Service providers implement the method to return an that implements a service.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.AddIn.Contract.IContract QueryService (string serviceIdentifier, string serviceContractIdentifier);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract QueryService(string serviceIdentifier, string serviceContractIdentifier) cil managed
Public Function QueryService (serviceIdentifier As String, serviceContractIdentifier As String) As IContract
public: System::AddIn::Contract::IContract ^ QueryService(System::String ^ serviceIdentifier, System::String ^ serviceContractIdentifier);

span.span: The name of the service that is being requested.
The service contract that is being requested.

summary.span: Retourne un contrat de service implémenté par ce .

span.span: Returns a service contract that is implemented by this .

returns.span: qui représente un contrat de service qu'un client demande à partir du ; si le n'implémente pas le contrat demandé.

span.span: An that represents a service contract that a client is requesting from the ; if the does not implement the requested contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Les formats des chaînes qui identifient les services et les contrats de service sont définis par le implémentation.The formats of the strings that identify services and service contracts are defined by the implementation. Il est recommandé que implémentations identifient un contrat de service par le propriété du type qui implémente le contrat de service.It is recommended that implementations identify a service contract by the property of the type that implements the service contract.
